metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: You can delete a table, or collection as it is called in MongoDB, by using the drop() method.
content.html: You can delete a table, or collection as it is called in MongoDB, by using the drop() method.

content.code_html:
import pymongo

myclient = pymongo.MongoClient("mongodb://localhost:27017/")
mydb = myclient["mydatabase"]
mycol = mydb["customers"]

mycol.drop()

content.text: The drop() method returns true if the collection was dropped successfully, and false if the collection does not exist.
content.html: The drop() method returns true if the collection was dropped successfully, and false if the collection does not exist.
